design_system.name: Developer Platform Landing Page
design_system.design_philosophy: Bold, confidence-inspiring developer-focused design with strong hierarchy and clear value propositions

primary.description: Vibrant coral-orange used for hero sections, CTAs, and accent elements

secondary.description: Warm neutral backgrounds that create depth without harshness

accent.description: Used sparingly for emphasis and status indicators

font_family.primary: Sans-serif, likely Inter or similar modern geometric sans

section_headline.characteristics: Clear section breaks with strong hierarchy

subheadline.characteristics: Supporting copy, lighter weight for contrast

hero_section.composition: Full-width, vertically centered content on solid colored background
hero_section.background_treatment: Solid color with subtle gradient or glow effects at edges

content_sections.background_alternation: Alternating between white and warm cream backgrounds

primary_cta.style: Rounded corners (24-32px border-radius for pill shape)
primary_cta.background: White on colored backgrounds, brand orange on light backgrounds
primary_cta.hover_state: Subtle shadow or slight scale increase

cards.structure: Light background containers with subtle shadows or borders

tabs_navigation.active_state: Solid fill with white or colored background
tabs_navigation.inactive_state: Transparent with border or subtle background

diagrams_illustrations.color_coding: Different pastel hues for different elements (blue, green, purple)
diagrams_illustrations.background: Subtle pastel fills matching stroke colors
diagrams_illustrations.annotations: Small text labels integrated into diagram

code_blocks.background: Dark theme or light with subtle tint

pricing_tables.header_treatment: Clear tier naming with pricing emphasized
pricing_tables.feature_lists: Clean, scannable lists with clear hierarchy
pricing_tables.border_treatment: Subtle borders or different background colors
pricing_tables.highlight_tier: Slightly larger or with accent border for recommended option

statistics_metrics.presentation: Large numbers with descriptive labels below
statistics_metrics.font_weight: Bold for numbers (700), regular for labels (400)
statistics_metrics.spacing: Generous white space around each metric

comparison_sections.contrast: Different background colors for each side (e.g., white vs brand color)
comparison_sections.visual_balance: Equal weight given to both sides
comparison_sections.content_treatment: Clear headings with supporting evidence below

gradients.hero_glow: Radial gradient from center bottom, fading brand color to transparent
gradients.subtle_backgrounds: Linear gradients with minimal color shift for depth

borders.default: 1px solid with light gray or 10% opacity black

hero_messaging.structure: Bold statement headline + descriptive subheadline + single CTA

section_headers.pattern: Short, punchy headline + longer explanatory subtext

social_proof.presentation: Integrated naturally within flow, not isolated

hover_states.buttons: Shadow increase or subtle color shift

scroll_behavior.scroll_animations: Subtle fade-ins or slides as content enters viewport

responsive_behavior.mobile: Stack all columns, full-width buttons, reduced font sizes
responsive_behavior.desktop: Full multi-column layouts with maximum content width

design_principles.confidence: Bold statements, large typography, unafraid of white space
design_principles.clarity: Clear hierarchy, scannable content, minimal decoration
design_principles.modern_warmth: Professional but not cold, using warm neutrals and vibrant accents
design_principles.performance_aesthetic: Fast-loading feel, optimized visuals, functional over decorative

implementation_notes.css_approach: Utility-first framework (Tailwind-style) or design system tokens
implementation_notes.animation_library: Subtle, performance-conscious animations (CSS transitions or lightweight JS)
implementation_notes.image_handling: SVG for diagrams, optimized formats for photos, lazy loading
implementation_notes.accessibility: High contrast ratios, semantic HTML, keyboard navigation support
